article_title: FDA Approves First Genetically Modified Salmon For Consumption
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: fda, approves, first, genetically, modified, salmon, consumption

og.description: AquaBounty Technologies' salmon became the first genetically engineered animal to receive U.S. approval for human consumption.
